location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter states that the Governor in Council has ruled to discontinue the practice of paying the allowances of servants at Bushire to their agents at the Presidency, and has also directed that no more advances are to be made on account of the Presidencies of Fort William or Fort St George without the sanction of the Bombay Government.
